summary.overall_coherence: High coherence with minor path inconsistencies and one semantic contradiction. Documentation is comprehensive and well-structured with clear hierarchy. Spec documents are internally consistent. Minor discrepancies exist between documented directory names and actual structure.

findings.description: Directory name mismatch: CLAUDE.md documents directory as 'PROMPT-KIT/' but actual directory is 'prompts/'
findings.evidence: CLAUDE.md line 87 shows '├── PROMPT-KIT/' but filesystem contains 'prompts/' directory with all referenced files (SYSTEM_PROMPT.md, CHANGE_REQUEST_PROMPT.md, WORKFLOW.md, IMPLEMENTATION_CHECKLIST.md)
findings.suggested_action: Engineer: Update CLAUDE.md line 87 to 'prompts/' OR rename directory to 'PROMPT-KIT/'. Update all cross-references to use the actual directory name consistently throughout documentation.

findings.description: Case sensitivity inconsistency: CLAUDE.md uses 'spec/' (lowercase) while PRD_BUILD_SPEC.md uses 'SPEC/' (uppercase)
findings.evidence: PRD_BUILD_SPEC.md lines 6, 78-82 reference 'SPEC/TERMINOLOGY.md', 'SPEC/DATA_CONTRACTS.md', 'SPEC/TYPES.md' but all cross-references in CLAUDE.md, README.md, and other docs use lowercase 'spec/'
findings.suggested_action: Engineer: Standardize all references to use lowercase 'spec/' for consistency. Update PRD_BUILD_SPEC.md lines 6, 78-82 to use 'spec/' instead of 'SPEC/'.

findings.description: Intentional semantic duplication: README.md and CLAUDE.md both document the canonical reading order from spec/AUTHORITY.md
findings.evidence: README.md lines 8-9 and CLAUDE.md lines 14-15 both reference spec/AUTHORITY.md for canonical reading order. This is intentional redundancy for discoverability.
findings.suggested_action: No action required. This is intentional redundancy to help users find the hierarchy from multiple entry points.

findings.description: Semantic contradiction: Architecture diagram states '(20+ rules)' but documented v1 spec contains exactly 19 rules
findings.evidence: CLAUDE.md line 47 shows '│ (20+ rules) │' in the architecture diagram. CLAUDE.md line 99 and spec/RULEBOOK_INDEX.md line 41 both state 'Rule catalog (19 rules in v1)' and 'v1.0 first release includes Tier 1 + Tier 2 (19 rules)'
findings.suggested_action: Engineer: Update CLAUDE.md line 47 architecture diagram from '(20+ rules)' to '(19 rules)' for consistency with RULEBOOK_INDEX.md.

findings.description: Broken cross-references to PROMPT-KIT path in 5 locations
findings.evidence: README.md line 75, CLAUDE.md lines 87, 126, docs/ROOT_CAUSE_ANALYSIS_AND_ACTION_PLAN.md lines 382, 427 reference 'PROMPT-KIT/' directory, but actual directory is 'prompts/'. When users follow the reference or an automated system tries to resolve the path, it will fail.
findings.suggested_action: Engineer: Replace all 'PROMPT-KIT/' references with 'prompts/' in: README.md line 75, CLAUDE.md lines 87 & 126, docs/ROOT_CAUSE_ANALYSIS_AND_ACTION_PLAN.md lines 382 & 427.

findings.description: Undocumented directory: CSS-promptify/ subdirectory exists but is not referenced in any documentation
findings.evidence: Directory listing shows /home/user/CSS-promptify/CSS-promptify/ as an empty directory with no contents and no mention in CLAUDE.md, README.md, or any spec documents
findings.suggested_action: Engineer: Either (1) Document the purpose of CSS-promptify/ in CLAUDE.md file structure if it serves a purpose, or (2) Remove the directory if it is no longer needed.

findings.description: Example uses 'LLM-friendly formatting + color shortening' title but demonstrates multiple independent fixes
findings.evidence: spec/EXAMPLES.md Example 1 (lines 15-42) shows fixes for: format/normalize-spaces, format/multiple-declarations-per-line, format/indent-2-spaces, and tokens/shorten-hex-colors. Title is accurate but could be more descriptive.
findings.suggested_action: No action required. Title is sufficiently descriptive of the overall example. This is a minor clarity opportunity, not an error.

findings.description: Reference uses 'PROMPT-KIT/' path instead of actual 'prompts/' path
findings.evidence: prompts/SYSTEM_PROMPT.md line 43 states 'Follow `PROMPT-KIT/IMPLEMENTATION_CHECKLIST.md` for phased development.' Should be 'prompts/IMPLEMENTATION_CHECKLIST.md'
findings.suggested_action: Engineer: Update prompts/SYSTEM_PROMPT.md line 43 reference from 'PROMPT-KIT/IMPLEMENTATION_CHECKLIST.md' to 'prompts/IMPLEMENTATION_CHECKLIST.md'.

findings.description: Test cases JSON file exists but is not documented or referenced in CLAUDE.md file structure section
findings.evidence: File /home/user/CSS-promptify/spec/test-cases.json exists (per CLAUDE.md line 104), but no documentation explains its structure, purpose, or how to use it. No examples show what the JSON contains.
findings.suggested_action: Engineer (optional): Add brief documentation in spec/AUTHORITY.md or create a section in spec/ explaining test-cases.json format and usage, or reference it in README.md.
